feed.title: Category: railsgirls summer of code | Bioshrimp

entry.title: Scribbles for Rails Girls SoC
entry.content:
Programming progress is currently not happening. I am still havenÂ´t passed chapter 5 of the Michael Hartl Rails tutorial. But there are other things: I was kindly asked if I would like to do some drawings for Rails Girls Summer of Code website, an organisation which is helping students to work on open source projects for a few month. A really supreme cool thing and if I hadn’t a full time job I would have loved to apply myself.

http://farm4.staticflickr.com/3758/9173836468_6c0b6f760e_z.jpg" title="(600 800 Moi" >
